page.title: 14Brisley/Horningtoft Jobs
page.content:
Some of the people who live in the area work close to home, others travel out of the area.
Most mums work as housewives,but other women work as teachers,home helps,waitresses and office workers.
Several men in the area work on farms, either on their own farms or working for other farmers. They mostly grow crops,but some breed animals as well.
Many men go out of the area to work in nearby towns. The work that they do includes working on machinery, woodwork and teaching. Some work in offices.
Some people have retired to live in the area.
